sentence.Network_en: The old man died sine prole in his 80 th year.
sentence.Network_cn: 这老头80岁去世,身后无子女.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Everyday word | 42,everything is 42 ... alluring adj. 诱惑的, 迷人的, prole n. 穷人 wary adj. 谨慎的; 小心翼翼的.
日本人学中文中国语単语例文集15... ... 无比 matchless 无产阶级 proletariat 无法 unable.

list.abs: The train was full of proles , in holiday mood because of the summery weather ., 火车上满是无产者 , 给暖洋洋的天气逗得兴高采烈.
If there was hope , it lay in the proles !, 如果有希望 , 希望在无产者中间!
as usual , there was no definite rule against talking to proles and frequenting their pubs , but it was far too unusual an action to pass unnoticed .按理，并没有具体规定，不许同无产者交谈，或者光顾他们的酒店，但是这件事太不平常，必然会有人注意到。
The birds sang , the proles sang . the Party did not sing ., 鸟儿歌唱 , 无产者歌唱 , 但党却不歌唱.

entry.def: A prole is someone in a low social class.

example.ex: We had proles working alongside university types as equals.
example.tran: 我们把工人和大学生安排在一起工作，对他们一视同仁。

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the working class (not necessarily employed);

list.explanation: 无产者，工人阶级或下曾阶级的一员

example.en: There're a lot of rots talked about the sufferings of the working class. I'm not so sorry for the proles myself.
example.zh: 有多人把工人阶级的痛苦当作笑活谈论。我本人并不同情工人阶级。
